purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 刅 indicates the sound; 米 (millet) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
黄粱梦 [ huáng liáng mèng ]: dream of golden millet; fig. illusions of wealth and glory; pipe dream
红高粱 [ hóng gāo liáng ]: red sorghum
甜高粱 [ tián gāo liáng ]: sweet sorghum
高粱 [ gāo liáng ]: sorghum; common sorghum (Sorghum vulgare)
黄粱一梦 [ huáng liáng yī mèng ]: see 黄粱梦

heisig_chinese_memo: A fine millet is a small-grained grass. The decapitation of rice leads to a fine millet (a smaller grain).
Ru_trainchinese: liáng: (графема) сорго; (букв.) очищенное просо; очищенное пшено (высшего сорта)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the double-edged sword (刅) in the water (氵) makes the rice (米) into high quality rice
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A fine millet is a small-grained grass. The decapitation of rice leads to a fine millet (a smaller grain).
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze originally from " meters " from " Chuang " from " m " to represent " beam " is a kind of rice, add the " water ", " well ", " Chuang ", " Chuang " is " invasive " The beginning of the text, like a human hand and foot injury, is used here as a sound note.

The inscription means rice beams, and Shi Mianyan: "Use rice beams to hold them". "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Liang, press the millet." "Pianhai Leibian": "Liang, like millet and big, there are three kinds of yellow, blue, white, and there are red and black." "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Futian": "Milk and rice beams, a farmer's celebration."

"Said Wen": "Liang, the name of the rice. From the rice, Liang Shengsheng."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze originally from " meters " from " Chuang " from " m " to represent " beam " is a meter, the original meaning of rice sorghum.
humanum_full_description:
金文最初從「米」從「刅」，從「米」以表示「粱」是米的一種，後加從「水」、「井」，「刅」、「刱」是「創」的初文，象人手足受傷之形，在這裏用作聲符。

　　金文表示稻粱，史免簠：「用盛稻粱」。《說文通訓定聲》：「粱，按即粟也。」《篇海類編》：「粱，似粟而大，有黃、青、白三種，又有赤黑色者。」《詩．小雅．甫田》：「黍稷稻粱，農夫之慶。」

　　《說文》：「粱，米名也。从米，梁省聲。」
humanum_short_description: 金文最初從「米」從「刅」，從「米」以表示「粱」是米的一種，本義是稻粱。

①粟的优良品种的总称：一枕黄粱。
②(高粱)一年生草本植物，子实红褐色，可食，亦可酿酒、制淀粉。杆可用来编席、造纸等。亦称“蜀黍”。

The inscription means rice beams, and Shi Mianyan: "Use rice beams to hold them". "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Liang, press the millet." 粱字的基本解释

粱
liáng
粟的优良品种的总称：一枕黄粱。
〔高粱〕一年生草本植物，子实红褐色，可食，亦可酿酒、制淀粉。杆可用来编席、造纸等。亦称“蜀黍”。
精美的主食：膏粱（泛指美味的饭菜，如“粱粱子弟”，旧时指达官贵人家的子弟）。粱糗（粱制的干粮）。粱肉。

粱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáng］
［《廣韻》吕張切，平陽，來。］
(1)即粟。通称“谷子”，去壳后称“小米”。古称其优良品种为粱，今无别。
(2)特指精细的小米。
(3)引申为精美的饭食。

粱字的英文翻译

◎ 粱
fine grain

粱字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　粱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页909第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】呂張切【正韻】龍張切，?音梁。【說文】米名也。【篇海】似粟而大，有黃靑白三種，又有赤黑色者。【韻會小補】粱，粟類，米之善者，五穀之長，今人多種粟而少種粱，以其損地力而收穫少也。【爾雅·釋草註】虋，赤粱粟。芑，白粱粟。【周禮·天官】犬宜粱。【疏】犬味酸而溫，粱米味甘而微寒，氣味相成，故云犬宜粱。【廣志】有具粱、解粱，有遼東赤粱。【本草】白粱味甘，微寒，無毒，主除熱益氣，有襄陽竹根者最佳。黃粱出靑、冀。【杜甫·贈衞八處士詩】夜雨翦春韭，新炊閒黃粱。【註】《本草》香美逾諸粱，俗呼竹根黃。　又莠類曰粱。【爾雅·釋草】稂，童粱。【註】莠類。【疏】稂，一名童粱。　【集韻】或作梁。

考證：〔【說文】稻穀名。〕　謹照原文改米名也。〔【杜詩】新炊聞黃粱。〕　謹照原文聞改閒。
粱字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
粱字的起名意思

：指优良品种。

beam
Basic explanation of words
beam
liáng
The general name of the fine varieties of millet: a pillow of yellow beams.
[Sorghum] An annual herb with red-brown seeds, edible, and can also be used to make wine and starch. The pole can be used for weaving seats, making paper, etc. Also known as "shu millet".
Exquisite staple food: Gaoliang (referring to delicious meals in general, such as "Liangliangzi", which used to refer to the children of noble families). Liang embarrassment (dry food made from beams). Liang meat.
beam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáng］
["Guangyun" Lv Zhangqie, Binh Duong, come. ]
(1) That is millet. Commonly known as "millet", after shelling, it is called "millet". In ancient times, its fine variety was called Liang, and it is no different today.
(2) Especially fine millet.
(3) Extended to exquisite meals.
beam

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Uncollected First] [Mi Zi Department] 　liang; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 909 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Lu Zhangqie [Zheng Yun] Long Zhangqie, sound beam. [Said the text] The name of rice is also. [Pianhai] It is as big as a millet, there are three types of yellow and white, and there are red and black ones. 【Rhyme Meeting Xiaobu】Beam, millet, good rice, long grains, people nowadays have many kinds of millet but few beams, because of its damage to the land, the harvest is small. [Erya·Shi Cao Note] Qi, Chiliangsu. Fu, Bailiangsu. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan】The dog is suitable for Liang. 【Sparse】Dogs taste sour and warm, and rice is sweet but slightly cold, and the smell is similar. Therefore, dogs are better for dogs. [Guangzhi] There are two liang, jieliang, and Liaodong red liang. 【Materia Medica】White beam is sweet, slightly cold, non-toxic, mainly removes heat and nourishes qi, and has Xiangyang bamboo roots. Yellow beams come out of 靑 and Ji. 【Du Fu·Poems of Eight Scholars Presenting Wei Wei】Yeyu Jianchun leeks, new cooking yellow beams. [Note] "Materia Medica" is more fragrant than all beams, and it is commonly called bamboo root yellow.　The class is called Liang. 【Erya·Shuicao】稂, Tongliang. [Note] Attorneys. 【Sparse】Zi, a child.　【Jiyun】or as a beam.
